activities: iModules Software, Inc. is a Software as a Service (SaaS) provider of a constituent engagement and communication platform. There are two main areas of activities that can result in the receipt of personal information from the European Union.  First, is the receipt of the client's membership database file for the building of the client online web community. Second, is the voluntary opt-in submitting and updating of personal data by the client members via the online application in the form of profile data, events registration and online fundraising information. iModules hosts the database containing all of this international member information in Canada, providing a suite of tools for EU clients to retrieve and analyze this information at any time.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The DMA Safe Harbor Program's dispute resolution mechanism.
